===================================
Welcome to Alembic's documentation!
===================================

`Alembic <https://alembic.sqlalchemy.org>`_ is a lightweight database migration tool for usage
with the `SQLAlchemy <https://www.sqlalchemy.org>`_ Database Toolkit for Python.
